reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is an excellent professor. Her lectures are clear, and she's always willing to help students.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Good professor, but sometimes his explanations can be a bit hard to follow.

reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her stuff, but her classes are very challenging.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Not very engaging, and the exams are difficult.

reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Makes chemistry fun and interesting.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but the grading is tough.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is passionate about literature and it shows in her teaching.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging and informative. She really cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures, but the material can be dense.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Amazing professor! Makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.review: Not very engaging and the exams are tricky.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but the lectures can be boring.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Great professor, but the projects are very demanding.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and very supportive of students.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is a great musician and an even better teacher.

reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are informative but a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and real-world examples. Challenging, but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've ever had. Very supportive and knowledgeable.
